long_description: Hex-head screws abound on your bikes, boards, skis and other outdoor gear. The compact Gerber GDC Zip Hex tool keeps the right-size tool close at hand whenever you need it. Rotating wheel holds the five most common sizes of metric Allen wrenches for your gear: 2.5mm, 3mm, 4mm, 5mm and 6mm. Simply choose a bit and snap it securely into place. Lightweight, grippy handle resists slippage; stainless steel bits will hold up to serious torque. Lanyard attachment and quick-release clip makes it easy to remove the tool from a keychain or zipper; compact size won't hog valuable space in your pocket or bike bag.
short_description: Hex-head screws abound on your bikes, boards, skis and other outdoor gear. The compact Gerber GDC Zip Hex tool keeps the right-size tool close at hand whenever you need it.
